casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Clyde E. WILLIAMSON. No. 296P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Douglas L. Hall, Morganton, for Clyde E. Williamson.

Christa McTal Williamson, Pro Se.

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of October 2006 by Defendant To Pray Leave To Document Issue Addressed In Previous Pro Se Filing Upon Showing of Good Cause As To Delay:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
